MINUTE-BY-MINUTE UPDATES 

It’s hard to stay on top of everything that’s going on at the Olympics! The Olympics App allows you to stay updated with minute-by-minute news on all your favourite events.  


CUSTOMISED FEED 

Create a customised experience by adding all your favourite Olympic events, teams and athletes. That way, you can enjoy content and updates that cater to your Olympic interests. 

 
PODCASTS & NEWS 

Listen to curated Olympic podcasts that inspire and motivate the athlete in all of us. You’ll find the most in-depth sports coverage right here on the app, as well as an exclusive look behind the scenes.
